resources.string: At Hotel MobiHot, we bring you the same wonderful experiences we grew up on: from our warm family hospitality to the authentic aromas in our kitchen, to our flavorful, handmade recipes passed down for more than a generation. Hotel MobiHotâ€™s is enriched with its own identical recipes in the usual Chettinad, North & South Indian, Chinese, Arabian menu by our unique method of selection of raw materials and cooking methods which can only be experienced by tasting not by words
